BiblioData.Title: PHOTONIC INTEGRATED CIRCUIT
BiblioData.Abstract: An optical platform including optical bench, an optical or photonic coupling device and a photonic circuit. The photonic circuit includes a photonic crystal along a waveguide and/or defect. The coupling device may be a waveguide or impedance matching interconnection device. The optical bench includes a rectangular trench to seat an optical fiber and provide alignment with the photonic circuit.

Claims.P: We claim:
1. An optical platform comprising an optical bench and a photonic circuit, said optical bench including a rectangular trench, wherein said photonic circuit includes a photonic crystal.

2. The optical platform of claim 1, further comprising an optical fiber, said optical fiber having a fiber core and being inserted in said rectangular trench, wherein said fiber core is vertically aligned with said photonic circuit.
3. The optical platform of claim 1, further comprising cladding layers, said cladding layers enveloping said photonic circuit.
4. The optical platform of claim 2, further comprising a coupling device, said coupling device interconnecting said optical fiber and said photonic circuit.
5. The optical platform of claim 4, wherein said coupling device is an impedance matching coupling device.
6. The optical platform of claim 5, wherein said impedance matching coupling device is tapered.
7. The optical platform of claim 5, wherein said impedance matching coupling device is flared.
8. The optical platform of claim 1, wherein a portion of said photonic circuit protrudes into said rectangular trench.
9. The optical platform of claim 1, wherein said photonic crystal includes a defect.
10. The optical platform of claim 1, wherein said photonic circuit includes a channel drop filter.
11. The optical platform of claim 1, wherein said photonic circuit includes a three or more input ports.
12. A method of forming an optical platform comprising the steps of:
providing a substrate;
forming a rectangular trench in a portion of said substrate;
filling said trench with a dielectric material;
planarizing the surface of said dielectric material; and
forming a photonic crystal on said planarized surface.
13. The method of claim 12 further comprising the steps of:
masking the portions of said photonic crystal not vertically disposed over said trench;
etching the portion of said photonic crystal vertically disposed over said trench; and
etching said dielectric material that fills said trench.

14. The method of claim 12, wherein said substrate is a silicon on insulator substrate, said silicon on insulator substrate including an oxide layer interposed between a bonded silicon layer and a base silicon substrate.
15. The method of claim 14, where said photonic crystal is formed in said bonded silicon layer.
